presentationColumns.name: Transaction Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the sum of transaction amount for specified accounts.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Journals.Transaction Amount in Document Currency

presentationColumns.name: Net Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the net amount of the specified accounts. Where Net Amount = Sum of Debit Amount - Sum of Credit Amount.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Journals.Transaction Amount in Document Currency

presentationColumns.name: Debit Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the sum of debit entries amount for specified accounts.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Journals.Debit Amount in Document Currency

presentationColumns.name: Credit Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the sum of credit entries amount for specified accounts.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Journals.Credit Amount in Document Currency
